welcome.title: Welcome to Your Dashboard!
welcome.content: This is your learning command center. Here you can see your progress, access courses, and track your achievements. Let's take a quick tour!

sidebar.title: Navigation Menu
sidebar.content: This is your navigation sidebar. It contains all the sections you need to manage your learning journey. Let's explore each section!

home.title: Dashboard Home
home.content: This is your main dashboard page where you can see an overview of your learning progress, recent activities, and quick access to important features.

learning.title: My Learning
learning.content: Access all your study modules, courses, and learning materials here. This is where you'll spend most of your time studying and practicing.

progress.title: My Progress
progress.content: Track your learning journey with detailed analytics, study time statistics, achievement progress, and performance insights across all subjects.

quiz.title: Quick Quiz
quiz.content: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes and practice exercises. Perfect for reviewing what you've learned and preparing for exams.

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.content: Get help from our intelligent AI assistant. Ask questions, get explanations, and receive personalized learning recommendations.

tips.title: Tips & Tricks
tips.content: Discover study techniques, learning strategies, and helpful tips to improve your academic performance and study efficiency.

stats.title: Your Learning Stats
stats.content: These cards show your key learning metrics at a glance. Track your study time, completed lessons, and overall progress.

studyTime.title: Study Time Tracking
studyTime.content: This shows how much time you've spent studying today. Consistent daily practice is key to success!

lessons.title: Lessons Completed
lessons.content: Keep track of how many lessons you've finished. Each completed lesson brings you closer to your goals.

progress.title: Overall Progress
progress.content: Your overall learning progress across all subjects. Click to view detailed progress analytics.

modules.title: Study Modules
modules.content: These are your available study modules. Click on any module to start learning or continue where you left off.

welcome.title: Welcome to AIDAKI, {name}!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with your learning journey.
